name: CjQ (Complex Java Queries)
short_description: CjQ (Complex Java Queries) is a library intended to introduce functional programming features in Java. One feature is the reducing of information brought by complex Java objects by simply selecting the fields you want to give away. It's SQL-like.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Affero GNU Public License
